org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class AlertDefinitionBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.AlertDefinitionBuilder

public class AlertDefinitionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to create AlertConditions. An AlertCondition is a check that done within the processing of an AlertDefinition. Each AlertDefinition must have 1 or more AlertConditions associated with it. When more than one AlertCondition is specified, the required flag will indicate if all or one of the conditions are required for the AlertDefinition to fire.

See Also:
AlertDefinition.getAlertCondition()

createThresholdCondition

public static AlertCondition createThresholdCondition(boolean required,
                                                      java.lang.String metric,
                                                      AlertDefinitionBuilder.AlertComparator comparator,
                                                      double threshold)
Create a threshold alert condition. (i.e. When x > y)

Parameters:
required - Indicates if this condition is required or optional for this alert to fire.
metric - The metric name to evaluate.
comparator - The comparison to perform.
threshold - The threshold value that will be compared.
Returns:
A threshold AlertCondition.

createSnmpAction

public static AlertAction createSnmpAction(java.lang.String address,
                                           java.lang.String notificationMechanism,
                                           java.lang.String oid,
                                           java.lang.String variableBindings)
Create a SNMP AlertAction

Parameters:
address - The IP address (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx/port) of the target engine.
notificationMechanism - The notification mechanisim.
oid - The first SNMP variable binding OID. This OID is required and the value is the output from snmp_trap.gsp.
variableBindings - Optional SNMP variable bindings in JSONArray format.
Returns:
An AlertAction that can be included in AlertDefinition.getAlertAction().
